did.abstract: This collection consists of 13 photographs by various photographers: Arnold Eagle, Jill Freedman, Morris Huberland, Consuelo Kanaga, and Barton Silverman. The images date from circa 1860 to 1976, and include New York City street scenes and portraits.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: This material was originally included in the finding aid for the Michael Sonnenfeldt Collection of Theatre, Film, and Entertainment Photography PR 305, which was processed by project intern Brynn White in 2014. This material was separated into a discrete collection with finding aid in 2019 by processing archivist Marybeth Kavanagh.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 13 photographs by various photographers: Arnold Eagle, Jill Freedman, Morris Huberland, Consuelo Kanaga, and Barton Silverman. The images include New York City street scenes and portraits. Subjects include Wall Street, the Lower East Side, children, Russian Jewish immigrants, police, firemen, and portraits of Abe Birnbaum and Manuel Komroff. The images date from circa 1860 to 1976.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The photographs are arranged alphabetically by photographer.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This material was originally included in the finding aid for the Michael Sonnenfeldt Collection of Theatre, Film, and Entertainment Photography PR 305, which was processed by project intern Brynn White in 2014. This material was separated into a discrete collection with finding aid in 2019 by processing archivist Marybeth Kavanagh.
